website_summaries.verdict: Day hikers have a lot to look forward to when wearing the Adidas Swift Terrex R2 Mid GTX during their adventures. Its lightness, comfortable feel, and traction are well-received by outdoor enthusiasts.On the other hand, the questionable durability of this product makes buyers disappointed. Overall, despite these mishaps, wearers can still be treated to a satisfying on-trail performance.
pros: Droves of Adidas Terrex Swift R2 Mid GTX users appreciate the lightness of this gear
Many consumers say that it supplied good grip on wet and dry surfaces
The majority are impressed with the comfy feel of these hiking boots from Adidas
Some owners testify to the effectiveness of the shoe’s waterproof liner
A few buyers applaud the breathability of this Adidas product
cons: A good number of Adidas Terrex Swift R2 Mid GTX owners are disappointed with the absence of a wide version
Some say that the boot is too narrow for them
An avid hiker doubts its durability
He is a tad displeased when the stitching at the collar and toe area of the boot tore apart after a few miles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trainer/walking boot. As soon as I put them on they fit like a glove and I don’t say that about many shoes/trainers I first put on. Comfortable, right size and nice padding. I tend to wear them about 10-12hrs a day and I’ve not had a wet foot once nor have I had aches or pains whilst wearing them. I am tempted to buy another pair just in case.
customer_reviews.author: cheekydragon

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE OF SECOND HAND BOOTS!!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult review to write as the boots were extremely comfy when trying them on in my home but upon further inspection as you can see these boots had clearly been worn before as there was still mud on the sole!! Could not believe my eyes ... Sent them back and got a replacement pair and they were exactly the same. All scuffed on the front and clearly been worn ... Shocking selling these second hand boots. I hope no else has just settled for this or not noticed. Look at my pictures and you can clearly see what they looked like when taking them out of the box. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Order a size 7 and had to return for 8’s and they are perfect, advice is to go up a size but other than that after a year of having these boots in my wish list it was money well spent and they’re brilliant, super comfortable, durable and waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great boot worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot I opted for a half size bigger so that I could wear bigger thicker socks but this was a personal point. I don’t think it would have made either difference either way but more than happy how comfortable they are. Normally takes a few wears to break in boots but not these straight out the box and a 9 mile hike. Amazing how good these are.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots...my husband can’t stop saying how much he loves them
customer_reviews.text: We bought these shoes for going to Norway in December and they passed the snow test with full marks. And not just the snow test, they are just perfect in every outdoor situation...my husband loves them so much that he’s planning on buying the shoes too. Couldn’t be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: ale

customer_reviews.title: Good boot worth a buy.
customer_reviews.text: Never had Terrex before and had purchased them over Solomon due to price. Boots are light but did take a while to break in before becoming really comfortable. Great for my needs keeping my feet dry over moderate walks.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing them as work boots, superb,great support feel great on and still comfy as ever,highly reommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris Woods

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant boots. On my second pair. Make sure you get one size up
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: best boots I ever tried/had
customer_reviews.text: I got half a size bigger because I saw it recommend on the Adidas website. My review is simple, best boots I ever tried/had.
customer_reviews.author: Diogo

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots. Get half a size bigger as they come up a bit small but a very good boot
customer_reviews.author: B G Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of hybrid Trainer/Walking boots and these are great. Comfortable, supportive and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Order half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Order a half size bigger than normal Epic boot comfortable and rugged !
customer_reviews.author: Enter name here

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant boots
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boots, light to wear but very warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: RSECJ

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: Only been used for 8 months and are leaking. Adidas state there is a 2 year warranty but only if you buy through them. Shocking as they’re not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, very waterproof and sole very grippy! Would recommend half to a whole size bigger than you would normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Smart Look active Boot/Trainer in One
customer_reviews.text: Found these to fit me like a glove as i hoped with the size Selected. Not needing to get the next size up as recommended by other reviewers. < strangely enough and lucky for me. They look really good on and feel so comfortable to wear i was actually delighted to have got them on Friday before the day expected. Bonus for me and perfect for both active and casual wearing. < They fit in anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Childs

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves these trainers/ walking boots, it's his third pair and he only wants these for christmas. Comfy and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: English Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with these when I first got them but but I don’t walk very far with the dog every day so imagine my surprise that after only 6 months when spraying mud off the soles I noticed the right boot let in water. Really not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought the trainer version of the Terrex last year and lived in them, so when winter arrived I got the boots! These are actually better without the speed-lacing system of the trainer version. The comfort and fit is immediately superb - definitely go up half a size though, or even a full size if you intend to wear thick socks. The best thing about the Terrex range is the Goodyear sole. Very soft, sticky rubber with immense grip even on wet, slimy rocks. They are as light as a pair of trainers, yet remarkably strong. The Goretex liner keeps everything dry, and they clean up well. I have no hesitation in recommending them 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Terrex Swift R2 Mid Cross Trainers
product_meta.description: Designed for the mountain, these men's fast hiking shoes are lightweight, breathable and built in an abrasion-resistant ripstop mesh. They feature a TPU support structure for midfoot stability and a TRAXIONTM outsole with ContinentalTM Rubber for optimal grip in rocky and wet conditions. Mesh and synthetic upper for lightweight and comfort. Sockliner: Molded sockliner to enhance comfort and fit. Midsole: Lightweight EVA midsole for long term cushioning. Outsole: Continental Rubber for extraordinary grip.
feature_bullets: Great hiking and trekking shoe, Gore-Tex upper and lining, versatile, durable and waterproof on the outer, BOOST midsole offers a high adaptability, lightweight EVA midsole offers a stabile mid-foot support, molded sockliner offers great fit and comfort
